messages.title: Delivering Brexit in Newport West
messages.content: Local campaigner and experienced councillor with a firm reputation for getting things done. Will always stand up for jobs and investment in Newport. Has a plan to improve our city and deliver for local residents.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An extra £1.2 billion for the Welsh NHS
More funding available for schools across Wales
Cutting income tax for 32 million people
£700 million to deliver Growth Deals across Wales

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn propped up by Nicola Sturgeon
mentions.tacticalSituation: John Curtice: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority. This election will be close. Your local vote will decide it.

issues.economy: Cutting income tax for 32 million people
issues.education: More funding available for schools across Wales
issues.health: An extra £1.2 billion for the Welsh NHS

community.content: Has a plan to improve our city and deliver for local residents.
